update trustee_trade set trustee_id = #{trusteeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cycle = #{cycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total = #{total,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_unit_price = #{saleUnitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_total = #{saleTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, interest_rate = #{interestRate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, income = #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, income_rate = #{incomeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id, status, trustee_id as trusteeId, NAME, status, fund_id as fundId, fund_name as fundName, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, cycle as cycle, unit, unit_price as unitPrice, sale_unit_price as saleUnitPrice, sale_total as saleTotal, interest_rate as interestRate, total, income, income_rate as incomeRate, create_time as createTime FROM trustee_trade WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT fund_id FROM trustee_trade WHERE trustee_id = #{trusteeId} AND `status` = 1 GROUP BY fund_id
SELECT sum(tt.unit) AS unit, sum(tt.total) AS total FROM trustee_trade tt WHERE tt.fund_id = #{fundId} AND tt.trustee_id = #{trusteeId} AND tt.`status` = 1 GROUP BY fund_id
